title: Ranked Teams
body: Probably a really stupid question but what does it mean for new ranked teams to play 5 games in a single queue to keep the team from being inactive?

replies.body: Essentially, you need to play matches on your ranked team (5 matches to place/rank) or your team will be marked as inactive and another player will be able to register your team tag/name. Because Twisted Treeline is the only queue you can play with a Ranked Team, you'll have to play 5 3v3 matches to rank and not worry about inactivity.
